path: PDF Library/30 Rock Studio Maintenance - Graphic Maintenance Quick Reference/Trio/Virtual Trios.docx
text: Virtual Trios are accessed via thin clients, and require a Newtek device to output their preview over SDI. The thin clients are currently located in 7S, rack 16. The USB dongles for the virtual trios are plugged into an AnywhereUSB device in 7S, rack 111.If the virtual trios lose their licensing, the USB dongle can be reseated, or the device can be power cycled. The Newtek device supplies SDI output to the Virtual Trios preview to be routable.
